name: Quack Attack
description:
Who said Carnage couldn't be cute?

Welcome to the wildest and wackiest arena shooter on the block! Dive into the chaotic world of 4v4 battles on a cube planet where the action is as unpredictable as the gravity. This cartoonish extravaganza is designed to be equal parts fun and frenetic, ensuring laughter is just as plentiful as limbs flying through the air.

🎮 Jump into the Cube Chaos:
Engage in heart-pounding 4v4 battles on a cube planet, where the dynamic environment keeps you on your toes. Jump, dodge, and outmaneuver your opponents to gain the upper hand in the most immersive arena shooter experience.


🐾 Animal Antics:
Take control of quirky animal characters, each with its own unique abilities and playstyle. From cunning cats to goofy giraffes, the roster is as diverse as the mayhem they unleash. It's an all-out animal brawl!

💣 Limb-Flipping Mayhem:
Embrace the absurdity as limbs go flying in every direction! Quack Attack lets you blow off your opponents' limbs with over-the-top weaponry, adding a comically gruesome touch to the battlefield. It's not personal; it's just part of the game!

🦆 Duck Collection Extravaganza:
Explore the vibrant maps scattered with adorable ducks waiting to join your feathery army. Collect as many ducks as you can, but beware – with great quacking power comes great responsibility. When you meet your pixelated demise, your amassed ducks will be left behind. The ultimate champion is the one with the most ducks when the final quack echoes through the chaos.

🔫 Collectible Weapons Galore:
Discover an arsenal of collectible weapons that turn every match into a symphony of firepower. From explosive paintball launchers to confetti-spewing bazookas, the variety of armaments adds an extra layer of strategy and silliness to the battleground. Adapt your playstyle, master the weaponry, and rain down cartoonish carnage on your foes.

🤣 Cartoonish Carnage at its Finest:
With its vibrant cartoonish art style and light-hearted elements, Quack Attack ensures that every match is a riotous spectacle. It's not just a game; it's a laughter-filled adventure that turns the idea of carnage on its head.

Get ready for the ultimate showdown where gravity is optional, limbs are expendable, and ducks are the true measure of victory. FPS mayhem has never been this cute and chaotic!
